cards: What’s the most embarrassing thing you’ve ever done?
Have you ever had a crush on someone in this room?
What’s a secret you’ve kept from your parents?
What’s the most trouble you’ve gotten into at school or work?
If you could change one thing about yourself, what would it be?
Who was your first kiss, and was it good or bad?
What’s a lie you’ve told recently, and who was it to?
What’s something you’ve done that you’re really ashamed of?
